Rio Grande at Otowi Bridge, NM (NRCS flows)
Rio Grande Basin
Annual (Water Year, Oct-Sep) streamflow reconstruction
Values in acre-feet
Recon = reconstruction
Observed = gaged flow record, corrected by NRCS to remove San Juan-Chama transfers
Recon Interval: 1450-2002	
Observed Interval: 1958-2000		
PI: D. Meko
Reference: n/a		
URL: http://treeflow.info/riogr/riograndeotowiNRCS.html	

==========
